value: SUITE 703 LEVEL 7 60 CITY ROAD, SOUTHBANK, 3006, VIC, Australia

0173 - Tree Nuts Summary > AROONA HOLDINGS PTY LIMITED is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover tree nuts. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. AROONA HOLDINGS PTY LIMITED is headquartered in Southbank, Victoria. It is headed by director Thierry Bedard. For the 2025 financial year, the company reported revenue of $63.66 million. Its net profit totalled $13.35 million. AROONA HOLDINGS PTY LIMITED forms part of the agriculture, forestry, and fishing industry sector.
